body.name: Be Smart Get Prepared 270Piece Medi+Can First Aid & Advance Wound Care Kit (Packaging may vary)

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Be Smart Get Prepared Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 2 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 2 mins
features: Medi+can Advance wound care kit is manufactured by the #1 leading manufacturer of first Aid kits in the USA. 270 pieces of comprehensive first aid treatment products.
Meets United States FDA regulatory standards as a medical device. Ideal for outdoor, emergency survival, automotive and more.
Equipped with advance wound care that has been proven to save lives in major hospitals, Police units and the US Military battlefields.
Organized and easy to use pre-packed treatments that will stop arterial bleeding and help clean, treat, and protect serious wounds and deep lacerations.

Housed in a standard .30 Cal ammo can (7.00in x 11.00in x 3.75in) that meets U.S. Department of defense Specifications mil-std-2073-1e. Stackable and comes with easy to carry handle and locking options. Heavy duty, hi visibility glow label utility can is air tight.
body.description: The Be Smart Get Prepared Medical first aid-advanced wound care kit has 270-pieces to stop bleeding fast and save lives. The airtight, heavy duty utility ammo can (7.00in x 11.00in x 3.75in) is organized and easy to use. The pre-packed treatments make it easy to clean, treat and protect you in the elements against cuts and abrasions, minor wounds and lacerations.– clean – (15) antiseptic wipes> (15) Alcohol prep pads– treat – (1) first aid guide (1) tweezers (2) Instant cold packs 5 in x 6 in (4) Nitrile gloves 2 pair (4) finger splints> (5) antibiotic Ointment> (5) burn creams (6) sting relief pads (10) aspirin tablets 5 packs (10) Non-Aspirin tablets 5 packs (20) cotton tip applicators 2 packs– protect – (1) adhesive tape 1/2 in x 2-1/2 yds (1) triangular bandage 40 in x 40 in x 56 in (2) Gauze Pads 5 in x 9 in (3) safety pins (4) Gauze Pads 4 in x 4 in (6) Gauze Pads 2 in x 2 in (10) Butterfly closure> (20) adhesive Bandages 1 in x 3 in (50) adhesive Bandages 3/8 in x 1-1/2 in (75) adhesive Bandages 3/4 in x 3 in

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Our flagship brand, Be Smart Get Prepared, is a complete line of First Aid and Emergency Preparedness kits for the following categories: Home and Family, Outdoor and Sporting Goods, Auto and Travel, Emergency Survival, and Industrial.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and Sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: Kit comes packed in a military grade, .30 caliber, steal ammo can (dimensions 10 x 3.5 x 7) . Container has a hinged lid with tension clamp-down rubber seal to keep the contents clean and dry. It fits perfectly under the back seat of my 2001 F250 crew cab. The contents of the kit come packaged in three sealed plastic bags and there is additional room inside to add a few additional items of your choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect First Aid kit!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great first aid kit! Love the container and it has everything in it that you would need! Everyone needs a few of these! Great for car, camper, home, office everywhere!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bright orange, not green
reviews.reviewText: Gave this as a gift. Didn't open it when I got it, but it was in perfect condition on the outside. I didn't know the can would be safety vest orange and not green like the pic, but it wasn't a make or break thing for me. Made with heavy metal like an actual ammo box. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product for many reasons!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Great first aid kitLove the ammo can. Tough can to keep contents from being damaged or wet. Good quality for the money. It's great a portion of the money goes to Hope For The Warriors. Good job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The materials inside were packed in zip lock bags and separated in a good order. The can is good quality. I really enjoy having this product. I keep it in my vehicle and have had to use it several times. I would buy from this company again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Came as described love it ice pack leaked great for emergancys and room to add stuff will order again great kit to leave in a car or truck in case of minor car wreaks or first aid on the go ideal for camping and lools good to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a nice kit and it is durable
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to keep in my work van in case some one was ever hurt. So far I have only really used the bandaids and the things for cuts and small sounds. It is a nice kit and it is durable. The cross on the box glows really good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars :( Why is it orange? Military green was the attraction.
reviews.reviewText: So. I am torn. I ordered the item in the photo. The Military green Med case. I got an almost neon orange box. I have lots of first aid kits. I really didn't need another, but the photo looked cool. But that is not what I got. So do I keep it or return it and can they exchange it for what I want. Do they have what I want? :(
